sentences.en: "I'll talk to you on Friday anyway."— 'Yep. Okay then.'
sentences.cn: “不管怎样，我星期五和你谈。”——“行，就这么定了。”

sentences.en: "What am I doing wrong, anyway?" — "Beats me, Lewis."
sentences.cn: “不管怎样，我到底做错了什么？”——“这我也不知道，刘易斯。”

sentences.en: A miracle is something that seems impossible but happens anyway.
sentences.cn: 奇迹就是看似不可能，却发生了。

sentences.en: Anyway, I soon got on the blower to him.
sentences.cn: 不管怎样，我立马给他去了电话。

sentences.en: Anyway, why didn’t you call the police?
sentences.cn: 总之，你为什么不报警？

sentences.en: Anyway, you're here; you might as well stay.
sentences.cn: 反正你已经在这儿了，那就留下来吧。

sentences.en: Becker has never been the most consistent of players anyway.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说，贝克尔从来就不是表现最为稳定的球员。

sentences.en: Catherine wasn’t sure the book was the right one, but she bought it anyway.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳不能确定就是这本书，但她还是买了。

sentences.en: He got lost and spent hours looking for the station, and anyway it was past midnight by the time he got home.
sentences.cn: 他迷了路，找车站花了几个小时，总之过了午夜才到家。

sentences.en: I don't know why I settled on Miami, but anyway I did.
sentences.cn: 我不知道为什么我落户到了迈阿密，但不管怎样我做了。

sentences.en: I know I'll be confronted with difficulties, but I will squeak by anyway.
sentences.cn: 我知道我会遇到许多困难，可我无论如何总能应付过去。

sentences.en: I left medicine anyway. I wasn't really cut out for it.
sentences.cn: 我还是放弃学医了，我真的不是那块料。

sentences.en: I probably would have voted that way anyway.
sentences.cn: 无论如何我可能都会那样投票。

sentences.en: I'd rather see it at the pictures than on video anyway.
sentences.cn: 我本来就宁可去电影院看，而不是看录像。

sentences.en: Let them talk about me; I'll be dead, anyway.
sentences.cn: 随他们怎么说我吧；我反正是要死的。

sentences.en: Let’s think about it for a while, for a few days anyway.
sentences.cn: 让我们想一想，至少考虑几天。

sentences.en: Mary Ann doesn't want to have children. Not right now, anyway.
sentences.cn: 玛丽·安不想要孩子，至少现在不想。

sentences.en: Nothing I do makes any difference anyway, so why bother?
sentences.cn: 既然我做什么都于事无补，我为什么还要费劲呢？

sentences.en: Recession has simply accelerated changes that have been reshaping the industry anyway.
sentences.cn: 经济萧条只不过加速了原本就在改变行业状况的变化。

sentences.en: The chase is always much more exciting than the conquest anyway.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说，追求的过程总比得手更为刺激。

sentences.en: There seems to have been a technical problem – anyway, that’s what they told me.
sentences.cn: 好像出了技术故障，至少他们是这么跟我说的。

sentences.en: This idea probably won’t work, but let’s try it anyway.
sentences.cn: 这个办法可能行不通，不过我们还是试试吧。

sentences.en: We were going to wallpaper that room anyway.
sentences.cn: 反正我们本来就打算在那间屋里贴墙纸的。

words.tran_cn: 总之；无论如何；不管怎样

trans.tran_cn: 无论如何，不管怎样，究竟，总之，（纠正说过的话）至少，（转移话题）对了，（结束谈话）那么
trans.tran_en: used when adding something that corrects or slightly changes what you have just said
